title: !~Spacious two bedroom, one and one half bath !~
posting_body: Beautiful, updated townhome-style condominium located in a gated community within Lafayette Park/Elmwood Park.
Excellent location, minutes from downtown without the downtown pricing.

Spacious two bedroom, one and one half bath condo, multi-level open floor plan, excellent for entertaining, with an updated kitchen with glass backsplash, stainless steel appliances, and stylish light fixtures.
Exotic stone countertops in updated kitchen, and luxurious vessel sink in the bathroom.
Two bedrooms share outdoor balcony, attached garage, additional reserved parking space behind garage, ample guest parking, in-unit laundry.
Peaceful swimming pool and garden in center of community.
